architectural_notes: Adopt a single global i18n solution initialized at app startup (e.g., react-i18next) and call i18n.changeLanguage(newLang) immediately after the user saves their language preference so all UI rerenders in the selected language.
known_issues: Users encounter a persistent 'Backend Connection Error' on login (frontend cannot connect to backend).
Deployment/build occasionally fails with a 'Deployment error' after attempting to redeploy an expired draft.

existing_features.title: When the user selects a language in the Profile page and clicks Save, apply that language immediately across the entire app UI (pages, sections, tabs, buttons, dialogs, placeholders, toasts, and footer) without requiring a reload.
Audit and replace any remaining hard-coded user-facing strings in the protected app shell and main pages with i18n translation keys so that a language change updates all visible UI text consistently.
Ensure the selected language is persisted to the backend user profile languageTag and correctly restored on sign-in so the app loads in the last saved language.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement global i18n so when a user selects a language and saves it in their profile, the entire site (pages/sections/tabs/buttons) updates automatically without reload.

projectName: Ensure profile language selection instantly translates the entire UI after saving
